text: Hillary and Stephen have something in common. Hillary made a few confessions during her visit to, as she put it, the "Cathedral of Colbert." She's a tad bit envious of another former secretary of state's recent cameo on ?Madam Secretary.'  Hillary and Stephen finally cleared the air about something they had in common. She had a prediction about Donald Trump and Ben Carson.  Like most of us, she's still a little embarrassed about what she wore in college.  But one question was just too personal to answer.
title: Press Release - What We Learned About Hillary Clinton On the Late Show With Stephen Colbert
